Dispersing Shot.name: Dispersing Shot
Dispersing Shot.flavor: You let fly a forceful shot that shatters armor, flesh, and bone, knocking your enemy senseless.
Dispersing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Dispersing Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both). If you have combat advantage against the target, it is immobilized instead of slowed.
Dispersing Shot.aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage (save ends).

Instructive Miss.name: Instructive Miss
Instructive Miss.flavor: Your shot goes wide, but now you have your foe in your sights.

Instructive Miss.effect: You regain the use of the encounter attack power.

Scattershot.name: Scattershot
Scattershot.flavor: You hurl several stones at once, knocking your enemies back with each strike.
Scattershot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Scattershot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
